column2: Use dementation to invoke insanity in the target.
Use dementation to provoke extreme fear or anger in the target.
Use dementation to suppress part of the target's mind.
Use dementation to invoke confusion in the target.
You must contrive to get close to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] while they are distracted or engaged.
In one month you will be close to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName].
You are at a gathering in [Root.Location.GetName] when you spot someone looking at you oddly while you are busy.
I don't like the look of him.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided it is time for [This.GetTitledFirstName] to join the ranks of the insane. [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] backers will look for opportunities to get near and use Dementation on [This.GetTitledFirstName] - the higher the Plot Power, the more likely they are to find openings.
No one noticed the action against [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName].
Someone from [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s court has noted your attempt.
Your use of Dementation was successful.
For the first time in some time your mind feels at ease.
Your efforts to sow chaos in [Root.Location.GetName] have succeeded.
Someone is sowing chaos in [Root.Location.GetName] and you have been affected!
